title: FIX TEAM BUILDER
body: This game mode has so much potential to help the league community grow and riot is just letting it sit there and rot away. Waiting 15 minutes for a team of five then another 15 minutes to find a match is just ridiculous.

replies.body:
The problem with team-builder is that no one wants to either support or jungle. Because of this Q-times are long


Everyone needs to do support at least once in every 4 games for team-builder to work effectively.
its adc or sup, jungle is easily found

There's nothing wrong with the mode, it's not Riots fault no one uses it. If more people just played it instead of complaining about the queue times you'd see queue times go down. Fact is it's a community created problem that is only fixable by the community, it's somewhat of a paradox really. No one plays TB because of high queue times because no one plays TB because... You get the idea.
Completely agree 100% - tbh i didnt even think about it from this point of view either.

Fix something that people don't want to play? You understand how it works, right?

Yeah no one wants to play Teambuilder, it took me well over 12 minutes to find a team and match for two matches whereas in Blind Pick it takes half a minute. I usually don't mind having to fill most of the time so TB isn't worth it. If it had a similar queue time then I would definitely play it 24/7.
